Comment: Items: oslo (Orb of Slow), Ubertip (Tooltip - Extended)
Value: Adds 6 bonus damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attacks also become ranged when attacking air, and have a chance to slow a target enemy unit's movement speed by <AIos,DataA1,%>% and attack rate by <AIos,DataB1,%>% for 20 seconds. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes.
